description: Fully-featured metrics collection agent for Minecraft servers.

targets.query:
currentSeconds = (int(v: now()) / 1000000000)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "process_start_time_seconds" and r.server =~ /^${server:pipe}$/)
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: currentSeconds - int(v: r._value) }))
  |> mean()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "minecraft_players_count" and r.server =~ /^${server:pipe}$/)
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "minecraft_world_entities_count" and r.server =~ /^${server:pipe}$/)
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "minecraft_world_loaded_chunks" and r.server =~ /^${server:pipe}$/)
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "minecraft_tick_duration_seconds" and r._field == "count" and r.server =~ /^${server:pipe}$/)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s)
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> mean()

import "experimental"

doQuantile = (tables=<-, q) => tables
  |> histogramQuantile(quantile: q)
  |> duplicate(as: "_time", column: "_stop")
  |> window(every: inf)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _measurement: "quantile", _field: string(v: q)}))
  |> experimental.group(mode: "extend", columns: ["_measurement", "_field"])

histograms =
  from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "minecraft_tick_duration_seconds" and r._field != "count" and r._field != "sum" and r.server =~ /^${server:pipe}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(fn: last, every: v.windowPeriod)
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r._value)
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> window(every: v.windowPeriod)
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with le: float(v: r._field)}))
  |> drop(columns: ["_field"])

histograms |> doQuantile(q: 0.5)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "process_cpu_load_ratio" and r.server =~ /^${server:pipe}$/)
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jvm_memory_bytes_used" and r.server =~ /^${server:pipe}$/)
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "minecraft_tick_duration_seconds" and r._field == "count" and r.server =~ /^${server:pipe}$/)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: (tables=<-, column) => tables)

import "experimental"

doQuantile = (tables=<-, q) => tables
  |> histogramQuantile(quantile: q)
  |> duplicate(as: "_time", column: "_stop")
  |> window(every: inf)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _measurement: "quantile", _field: string(v: q)}))
  |> experimental.group(mode: "extend", columns: ["_measurement", "_field"])

histograms =
  from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "minecraft_tick_duration_seconds" and r._field != "count" and r._field != "sum" and r.server =~ /^${server:pipe}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(fn: last, every: v.windowPeriod)
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r._value)
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> window(every: v.windowPeriod)
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with le: float(v: r._field)}))
  |> drop(columns: ["_field"])

union(tables: [
  histograms |> doQuantile(q: 0.99),
  histograms |> doQuantile(q: 0.95),
  histograms |> doQuantile(q: 0.75),
  histograms |> doQuantile(q: 0.5),
])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "minecraft_players_count" and r.server =~ /^${server:pipe}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "minecraft_players_count" and r.server =~ /^${server:pipe}$/)
  |> difference()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "minecraft_world_loaded_chunks" and r.server =~ /^${server:pipe}$/ and r.world =~ /^${world:pipe}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "minecraft_world_entities_count" and r.server =~ /^${server:pipe}$/ and r.world =~ /^${world:pipe}$/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: "players: ${r.server}" }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "minecraft_world_players_count" and r.server =~ /^${server:pipe}$/ and r.name =~ /^${world:pipe}$/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: "entities: ${r.server}" }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${interval}, fn: (tables=<-, column) => tables)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "process_cpu_load_ratio" and r.server =~ /^${server:pipe}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "process_cpu_seconds_total" and r.server =~ /^${server:pipe}$/)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: (tables=<-, column) => tables)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jvm_threads_current_count" and r.server =~ /^${server:pipe}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jvm_threads_daemon_count" and r.server =~ /^${server:pipe}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jvm_threads_started_total" and r.server =~ /^${server:pipe}$/)
  |> difference()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jvm_memory_bytes_used" and r.server =~ /^${server:pipe}$/ and r.area == "heap")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jvm_memory_bytes_used" and r.server =~ /^${server:pipe}$/ and r.area == "nonheap")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jvm_gc_duration_seconds" and r._field == "sum" and r.server =~ /^${server:pipe}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["gc"])
  |> difference()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jvm_gc_freed_bytes" and r._field == "sum" and r.server =~ /^${server:pipe}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["gc"])
  |> difference()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum)

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "minecraft_world_players_count" and r.server =~ /^${server:pipe}$/)
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["world"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["world"])
list.name: world
list.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "minecraft_world_players_count" and r.server =~ /^${server:pipe}$/)
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["world"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["world"])

title: Minecraft
